name: Turismo AI
description: What is the project about? Turismo AI is a decentralized platform that operates at the intersection of AI and blockchain technology. The main objective is to revolutionize the tourism industry by providing businesses with a secure and efficient ecosystem that enables them to utilize AI technology in a decentralized manner. This approach allows for more accurate decision-making, greater transparency, and accountability. What makes your project unique? One of the unique features of Turismo AI is its use of autonomous economic agents, which are intelligent agents powered by machine learning algorithms. It can interact with one another and external data sources, providing businesses with customized solutions and enabling the creation of new applications, services and also approach to combining AI and blockchain technology has the potential to provide unprecedented levels of efficiency and accuracy in the tourism industry. History of your project. Turismo AI is a relatively new project, having held its initial DEX offering (IDO) on 22 Feb 2023. After raised 238 ETH (~$380,000) at the time of the sale, and the token ($TURAI) was listed on Uniswap v3 shortly after. The project is built and verified on Arbitrum blockchain. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Turismo AI expand its user base and further develop the platform to provide businesses with even more efficient and intelligent solutions. Turismo AI plans to achieve this goal by continuing to invest in research and development, building partnerships with other businesses in the industry, and working closely with its community to ensure the platform meets the needs of its users. What can your token be used for? $TURAI token represents a digital form of currency that serves as the primary means of transaction within the Turismo AI network. To access services offered by Turismo AI, payment must be made in TURAI, similar to how one would use USD to purchase goods and services in the United States.
